Entities.Name: Gleason Score
Entities.Definition: A grading system used to evaluate the prognosis of men with prostate cancer based on microscopic appearance.

Entities.Name: TNM Staging
Entities.Definition: A system used to describe the size and spread of cancer, incorporating Tumor (T), Nodes (N), and Metastases (M) values.

Entities.Name: Capsule Invasion
Entities.Definition: Indicates whether the tumor has extended beyond the capsule of an organ.

Entities.Name: Lymph Invasion
Entities.Definition: Indicates whether cancer cells have invaded the lymphatic vessels.

Entities.Name: Chronic Inflammation
Entities.Definition: Presence of long-term inflammation in the tissue.

Entities.Name: Vascular Invasion
Entities.Definition: Presence of tumor cells within blood vessels.

Entities.Name: Perineural Invasion
Entities.Definition: Cancer cells observed around or within nerves.

Entities.Name: Surgical Margin
Entities.Definition: Indicates whether cancer cells are present at the edge of the removed tissue.

Entities.Name: Seminal Vesicle Invasion
Entities.Definition: Indicates whether cancer has spread to the seminal vesicles.

Entities.Name: Lymph Nodes Sampled
Entities.Definition: Number of lymph nodes extracted for pathological examination.

Entities.Name: Lymph Nodes Detected
Entities.Definition: Number of lymph nodes found to contain cancer cells.

Entities.Name: Specimen Length
Entities.Definition: The length of the excised tissue specimen.

Entities.Name: Specimen Width
Entities.Definition: The width of the excised tissue specimen.

Entities.Name: Specimen Height
Entities.Definition: The height of the excised tissue specimen.

Entities.Name: Specimen Weight
Entities.Definition: The weight of the excised tissue specimen.

Entities.Name: Laterality
Entities.Definition: Specifies whether the tumor is located on the left or right side.

Entities.Name: Necrosis
Entities.Definition: Indicates the presence of dead cells within the tumor.

Entities.Name: Estrogen Receptor (ER)
Entities.Definition: Determines whether cancer cells have estrogen receptors.

Entities.Name: Progesterone Receptor (PR)
Entities.Definition: Determines whether cancer cells have progesterone receptors.

Dataset.Name: Pathology Extraction Pipeline Dataset
Dataset.Details: A dataset derived from pathology reports at the University of California, Irvine Medical Center, used for training and evaluating the Pathology Extraction Pipeline (PEP).

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Guidelines for annotating pathology reports, detailing the extraction of key cancer pathology entities.
Annotation Guidelines.Link: Not explicitly mentioned in the document.
